text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/5c3128efe6bc48cbd88da23973db389ad3b8ab63|patch 8.2.0737: when shell doesn't support CTRL-Z Vim still handles it>
patch 8.2.0737: when shell doesn't support CTRL-Z Vim still handles it

Problem:    When shell doesn't support CTRL-Z Vim still handles it.
Solution:   Ignore the STOP signal if it was ignored on startup.
            (Kurtis Rader, closes #5990, closes #6058)

attachments.text: Problem: When shell doesn't support CTRL-Z Vim still handles it. Solution: Ignore the STOP signal if it was ignored on startup. (Kurtis Rader, closes #5990, closes #6058)
